discourse_list.title: Scheduled grain distribution for week ending February 14th, 2021

content.content: The weekly SourceCred payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcements  WARNING:  Cred scores and payouts may see volatility in the coming weeks and months as we tweak the algorithm and payout parameters. We still have a lot of work to do before the system is optimized enough to “ossify”, producing predictable payouts. Payouts This week $5,000 worth of DAI was distributed to 62 contributors. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Cred Stats Below is a chart showing total Cred created (a proxy for work).  image1370×1004 78.2 KB  Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contribution Author     162.8 Maker Memes for Seb @Uncle   147.9 [Discussion] EuroDAI @SebVentures   129.1 [Tutorial] Adjusting a Vault’s Debt Ceiling with the IAM @Aaron_Bartsch   122.3 MakerDAO FLIP Auction Stats - YTD data @Primoz   121.7 [Signal Request] Lower PSM-USDC-A tout Parameter @hexonaut   116.5 The NFT Craze  and why Maker needs to Prioritize Centrifuge as a Layer 2 Solution @flipflopflapdelegate   112.3 [SNX] MIP6 Collateral Onboarding Application @kevinwildenradt   112.2 [Signal Request] Initial Flash Mint Module Fee @hexonaut   98.4 #1 on Interview with Seamus on the Oracle Team @Uncle   93.7 REPLY to: [Signal Request] Lower PSM-USDC-A tout Parameter @Primoz    Top Contributors Below are the top 10 contributors last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contributor     152.4 SebVentures   144.1 hexonaut   143.9 Primoz   139.5 ultraschuppi   131.2 LongForWisdom   111 monet-supply   104.8 alexis   94.6 iammeeoh   92.4 Aaron-Bartsch   85.4 Uncle    If you have any questions or concerns about the scores, data or presentation thereof, please don’t hesitate to ask!
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
